content:
From @Niek van Galen
We just published package 0.1.0 of Patient Corrections: https://simplifier.net/packages/nictiz.fhir.nl.r4.patientcorrections/0.1.0
Also on GitHub: https://github.com/Nictiz/Nictiz-R4-PatientCorrections/releases/tag/0.1.0
And ofcourse the IG: https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:Vpoc/FHIR_Patient_Corrections
